overview.intro: Ua ib tug thawj coj ntawm lub platform, koj muaj kev nkag mus rau cov cuab yeej dav dav rau kev saib xyuas thiab tswj hwm tag nrho Contentry platform. Phau ntawv qhia no yuav pab koj nkag siab txog koj cov peev xwm tswj hwm.
overview.dashboardDesc: Lub Dashboard ntawm Admin muab kev pom dav dav ntawm cov haujlwm thiab kev noj qab haus huv ntawm lub platform.
overview.feature1: Kev saib xyuas cov neeg siv khoom ua haujlwm tiag tiag
overview.feature2: Kev tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus thoob plaws lub platform
overview.feature3: Kev noj qab haus huv thiab kev ua tau zoo ntawm lub system
overview.feature4: Nkag mus rau cov haujlwm tseem ceeb ntawm kev tswj hwm sai
overview.tip: Mus saib Admin Dashboard tsis tu ncua kom paub txog cov qauv ntawm lub platform thiab txheeb xyuas cov teeb meem uas yuav tshwm sim thaum ntxov.

userManagement.intro: Kev tswj hwm tus neeg siv yog lub luag haujlwm tseem ceeb uas tso cai rau koj saib xyuas txhua tus neeg siv thiab cov lag luam ntawm lub platform.

userManagement.feature2: Saib cov ntaub ntawv qhia txog cov neeg siv thiab keeb kwm kev ua ub no

userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry muaj peb lub luag haujlwm tseem ceeb rau tus neeg siv:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Kev nkag mus rau tag nrho lub platform nrog rau kev teeb tsa lub kaw lus
userManagement.role2: Tus Thawj Coj Hauv Tuam Txhab: Tswj hwm pab pawg thiab chaw teeb tsa ntawm lawv lub tuam txhab
userManagement.role3: Tus Neeg Siv: Cov yam ntxwv txheem ntawm kev tsim thiab kev tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus
userManagement.warning: Nco ntsoov xyuas seb puas muaj qhov cuam tshuam ua ntej hloov cov luag haujlwm ntawm tus neeg siv lossis rho tawm cov nyiaj. Cov kev ua no yuav cuam tshuam rau cov txheej txheem ua haujlwm ntawm pab pawg.

analytics.metric5: Kev ua raws li txoj cai thiab cov qhab nia kev pheej hmoo thoob plaws cov tuam txhab
analytics.tip: Siv qhov feature Download Report los xa cov ntawv qhia txog kev tshuaj xyuas rau cov neeg koom nrog kev nthuav qhia.

gettingStarted.intro: Txais tos rau Contentry! Ua ib tug Enterprise Administrator, koj muaj cov cuab yeej los tswj koj pab neeg, tsim cov lus qhia txog cov ntsiab lus, thiab xyuas kom meej tias hom lag luam sib xws.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Ua raws li cov kauj ruam no los teeb tsa koj tus account lag luam:
gettingStarted.step1: Mus rau Chaw > Enterprise kom nkag mus rau koj lub tuam txhab dashboard
gettingStarted.step2: Upload koj lub tuam txhab cov lus qhia thiab cov cai ntawm hom lag luam rau hauv Lub Hauv Paus Kev Paub
gettingStarted.step3: Caw koj cov tswv cuab hauv pab neeg thiab muab lub luag haujlwm tsim nyog
gettingStarted.step4: Teeb tsa cov txheej txheem kev pom zoo rau kev tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus
gettingStarted.tip: Ua kom tiav koj qhov kev teeb tsa Lub Hauv Paus Kev Paub ua ntej caw cov tswv cuab ntawm pab pawg kom ntseeg tau tias lawv nkag mus rau cov lus qhia ntawm hom lag luam txij hnub thawj zaug.

teamManagement.intro: Kev tswj hwm pab pawg zoo ua kom muaj kev sib koom tes zoo thiab kev tswj hwm kev nkag mus rau hauv koj lub koom haum.
teamManagement.inviteTitle: Caw Cov Tswv Cuab Pab Pawg
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Ntxiv cov tswv cuab tshiab rau koj pab neeg ua lag luam:
teamManagement.feature1: Sau tus tswv cuab ntawm pab neeg tus email chaw nyob
teamManagement.feature2: Xaiv lawv lub luag haujlwm (Tus Tsim, Tus Thawj Coj, lossis Tus Thawj Coj)
teamManagement.feature3: Ntxiv ib tsab ntawv xa tuaj rau koj xaiv rau daim ntawv caw

teamManagement.rolesDesc: Muab cov luag haujlwm raws li cov luag haujlwm:

teamManagement.role2: Tus Thawj Coj: Tuaj yeem pom zoo / tsis lees txais cov ntsiab lus thiab tswj cov neeg tsim khoom
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Kev nkag mus rau tag nrho cov lag luam suav nrog kev them nqi thiab kev teeb tsa
teamManagement.tip: Cov ntawv caw yuav tas sij hawm tom qab 7 hnub. Nco ntsoov kom cov tswv cuab ntawm pab neeg lees txais lawv cov ntawv caw sai li sai tau.

knowledgeBase.intro: Lub Chaw Paub yog koj lub tuam txhab lub chaw khaws ntaub ntawv rau cov lus qhia txog hom lag luam, cov cai, thiab cov cai ntawm cov ntsiab lus. Cov ntaub ntawv xa tuaj ntawm no qhia txog cov ntsiab lus uas AI tsim rau txhua tus tswv cuab ntawm pab pawg.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Ntxiv cov ntaub ntawv uas yuav coj kev tsim cov ntsiab lus:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Cov lus qhia txog hom lag luam thiab cov lus qhia txog lub suab
knowledgeBase.docType2: Cov cai lij choj thiab kev ua raws li txoj cai
knowledgeBase.docType3: Cov lus qhia rau kev tshaj tawm hauv social media
knowledgeBase.docType4: Cov cai tswjfwm tshwj xeeb rau kev lag luam
knowledgeBase.tip: Upload koj cov lus qhia tseem ceeb tshaj plaws rau hom lag luam ua ntej. Lub AI muab qhov tseem ceeb rau cov ntaub ntawv hauv lub tuam txhab Knowledge Base dua li cov neeg siv upload.

strategicProfiles.tip: Tsim cov Qauv Txheej Txheem Sib Cais rau ntau yam phiaj xwm sib txawv, hom lag luam, lossis kev lag luam hauv cheeb tsam.

socialAccounts.intro: Txuas koj cov nyiaj social media kom tshaj tawm cov ntsiab lus ncaj qha los ntawm Contentry.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Cov platform txhawb nqa suav nrog:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Cov nplooj ntawv tus kheej thiab cov tuam txhab
socialAccounts.warning: Khaws koj cov kev sib txuas lus hauv social account kom tshiab. Cov tokens uas tas sij hawm yuav ua rau cov ntawv tshaj tawm teem sijhawm tsis tuaj yeem tshaj tawm.

approvalProcess.intro: Yog tias koj lub tuam txhab muaj cov txheej txheem kev pom zoo qhib, cov ntsiab lus yuav tsum tau saib xyuas ua ntej tshaj tawm.
approvalProcess.submitTitle: Xa Daim Ntawv Thov Kev Pom Zoo
approvalProcess.submitDesc: Cov txheej txheem kev pom zoo:
approvalProcess.step1: Tsim los yog tshuaj xyuas koj cov ntsiab lus
approvalProcess.step2: Nyem 'Xa kom tau kev pom zoo' kom xa mus rau koj tus thawj tswj hwm
approvalProcess.step3: Taug qab qhov xwm txheej kev pom zoo hauv kab tos kev pom zoo
approvalProcess.tip: Ntxiv cov lus sau thaum xa cov ntsiab lus los muab cov neeg saib xyuas cov ntsiab lus txog koj cov kev txiav txim siab muaj tswv yim.

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry yog ib lub platform txawj ntse txog cov ntsiab lus uas siv AI los pab cov neeg tsim cov ntsiab lus, cov neeg ua lag luam, thiab cov lag luam tsim, tshuaj xyuas, thiab tshaj tawm cov ntsiab lus raws li qhov loj me. Txawm tias koj yog ib tus neeg muaj feem cuam tshuam lossis ib feem ntawm pab pawg lag luam loj, Contentry ua kom koj cov txheej txheem ua haujlwm yooj yim dua.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Peb ntseeg hais tias yuav tsum muaj peev xwm txhawb nqa cov neeg tsim khoom nrog cov cuab yeej ntse uas ua kom txhua daim ntawv muaj nyob rau hauv hom lag luam, muaj kev nkag siab txog kab lis kev cai, thiab ua raws li cov lus qhia ntawm lub platform.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Kev tsim cov ntsiab lus uas siv AI los ua kom haum rau koj lub suab hom
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Kev kuaj xyuas kev ua raws li lub sijhawm tiag tiag rau cov kev cai lij choj
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Kev tshuaj xyuas kev nkag siab txog kab lis kev cai rau cov neeg tuaj saib thoob ntiaj teb
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Kev ua haujlwm pom zoo yooj yim rau cov pab pawg lag luam
whatIsContentry.tip: Cov ntsiab lus sib txuas lub zog ntawm AI nrog kev saib xyuas ntawm tib neeg los xa cov ntsiab lus uas cuam tshuam nrog koj cov neeg tuaj saib thaum tseem ua raws li txoj cai.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry muab cov cuab yeej siv tau zoo los tswj koj lub neej tag nrho ntawm cov ntsiab lus:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Kev Tsim Cov Ntsiab Lus Uas Muaj AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Tsim cov ntsiab lus zoo uas haum rau koj lub hom thiab cov neeg tuaj saib:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Kev tsim cov ntsiab lus ntau lub platform (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Cov suab sau ntawv uas hloov kho tau (Kev tshaj lij, Xwm txheej, Tshoov siab)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Kev tsim duab AI los nrog koj cov ntawv tshaj tawm
keyFeatures.complianceTitle: Kev Ua Raws Cai & Kev Tshuaj Xyuas
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Xyuas kom tseeb tias koj cov ntsiab lus ua tau raws li txhua yam uas yuav tsum tau ua ua ntej tshaj tawm:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Kev kuaj xyuas kev ua raws li txoj cai ntawm lub tuam txhab
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Kev ntsuas qhov rhiab heev ntawm kab lis kev cai rau cov neeg tuaj saib thoob ntiaj teb
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Kev ntsuam xyuas kev pheej hmoo nrog cov lus qhia ua tau
keyFeatures.tip: Siv Cov Qauv Txheej Txheem kom ntseeg tau tias lub suab ntawm hom lag luam sib xws thoob plaws txhua cov ntsiab lus tsim tawm.

bestPractices.intro: Ua raws li cov kev coj ua zoo tshaj plaws no yuav pab koj tau txais txiaj ntsig zoo tshaj plaws ntawm Contentry thiab tsim cov ntsiab lus uas ua haujlwm tau zoo:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Tsim kom muaj ib txoj haujlwm ua haujlwm ntawm cov ntsiab lus
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Ib txoj haujlwm ua haujlwm tas mus li ua kom muaj txiaj ntsig zoo thiab ua haujlwm tau zoo:
bestPractices.workflow1: Pib los ntawm kev teeb tsa koj daim ntawv qhia txog kev npaj ua lag luam nrog cov lus qhia txog hom lag luam
bestPractices.workflow2: Tsim cov ntsiab lus nrog lub platform tshwj xeeb thiab cov neeg tuaj saib hauv siab
bestPractices.workflow3: Ib txwm tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus ua ntej tshaj tawm rau cov platform sab nraud
bestPractices.workflow4: Siv cov yam ntxwv teem sijhawm kom tswj tau qhov kev tshaj tawm sib xws
bestPractices.consistencyTitle: Tswj Kev Sib Xws ntawm Hom Lag Luam
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Kev tsim hom lag luam tas mus li ua rau muaj kev ntseeg siab thiab kev lees paub:
bestPractices.consistency1: Upload koj phau ntawv qhia txog hom lag luam rau hauv Lub Hauv Paus Kev Paub
bestPractices.consistency2: Siv tib daim ntawv qhia txog kev npaj ua lag luam rau cov phiaj xwm sib txuas
bestPractices.consistency3: Tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus uas AI tsim los kom paub tseeb tias nws phim koj lub suab
bestPractices.warning: Ua ntej tshaj tawm, ib txwm saib xyuas cov ntsiab lus uas AI tsim tawm. Txawm hais tias peb lub AI muaj zog heev, kev saib xyuas ntawm tib neeg ua kom muaj txiaj ntsig zoo tshaj plaws.

optimizeContent.intro: Tsim cov ntsiab lus zoo tsuas yog qhov pib xwb. Nov yog yuav ua li cas kom zoo dua rau kev koom tes ntau tshaj plaws:
optimizeContent.platformTitle: Kev Txhim Kho Tshwj Xeeb rau Platform
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Txhua lub platform muaj cov kev xav tau tshwj xeeb thiab cov neeg tuaj saib xav tau:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Ua kom pom tseeb txog kev tshaj lij, siv cov lus tseem ceeb hauv kev lag luam, daim ntawv ntev dua siv tau
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Cov lus luv luv, siv cov hashtags kom zoo, koom nrog cov ncauj lus uas tab tom nrov
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Cov ntsiab lus pom ua tau zoo, txhawb kom muaj kev koom tes hauv zej zog
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Cov duab zoo tseem ceeb, siv cov hashtags cuam tshuam, Cov Dab Neeg rau kev koom tes
optimizeContent.engagement1: Tshaj tawm tas li ntawm lub sijhawm zoo tshaj plaws rau koj cov neeg tuaj saib
optimizeContent.engagement2: Siv cov lus hu kom ua haujlwm zoo hauv koj cov ntsiab lus
optimizeContent.engagement3: Teb cov lus tawm tswv yim thiab koom nrog koj lub zej zog
optimizeContent.engagement4: Taug qab cov kev tshuaj xyuas kom nkag siab txog cov ntsiab lus twg ua tau zoo tshaj plaws
optimizeContent.tip: Siv Contentry qhov kev teem sijhawm kom tshaj tawm thaum lub sijhawm zoo tshaj plaws yam tsis tas siv zog.

brandDeals.intro: Kev koom tes nrog cov lag luam tuaj yeem yog ib qho txiaj ntsig tseem ceeb. Nov yog yuav ua li cas los txhim kho koj txoj hauv kev:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Npaj Rau Kev Koom Tes Nrog Hom Lag Luam
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Npaj txhij thaum muaj lub cib fim:
brandDeals.prep1: Tswj kom muaj cov ntaub ntawv tshaj lij thiab ruaj khov
brandDeals.prep2: Taug qab thiab qhia koj cov kev ntsuas kev koom tes
brandDeals.prep3: Tsim ib lub pob khoom siv xov xwm nrog koj cov ntaub ntawv pej xeem thiab ncav cuag
brandDeals.prep4: Siv Contentry los tsim cov qauv ntsiab lus ntawm cov khoom lag luam
brandDeals.pitchingTitle: Kev Tshaj Tawm rau Cov Hom Lag Luam
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Ua kom koj cov lus qhia sawv tawm:
brandDeals.pitch1: Ua kom koj cov lus hais haum nrog lub hom lag luam tus nqi thiab cov neeg tuaj saib lub hom phiaj
brandDeals.pitch2: Muab cov tswv yim tshwj xeeb rau cov ntsiab lus es tsis yog cov lus pom zoo dav dav
brandDeals.pitch3: Muab kev tshuaj xyuas kev ua raws cai los qhia tias koj cov ntsiab lus ua tau raws li cov lus qhia
brandDeals.tip: Siv Contentry txoj kev kuaj xyuas kev ua raws cai thaum tsim cov ntsiab lus txhawb nqa kom ntseeg tau tias FTC thiab cov kev cai tshaj tawm platform tau ua tiav.

influencerProfiles.intro: Koj Daim Ntawv Qhia Txog Kev Npaj yog lub hauv paus ntawm koj txoj kev npaj cov ntsiab lus. Nov yog yuav ua li cas kom nws zoo dua:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Ib qho profile zoo uas tau teeb tsa zoo ua kom muaj cov ntsiab lus sib xws, ntawm hom lag luam:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Txhais koj lub niche thiab cov neeg tuaj saib kom meej meej
influencerProfiles.setup2: Teem koj lub suab thiab hom ntawv sau uas koj nyiam
influencerProfiles.setup3: Ntxiv cov kev xav txog kab lis kev cai thiab cheeb tsam rau koj cov neeg tuaj saib
influencerProfiles.setup4: Upload cov ntaub ntawv siv los piav qhia txog koj lub npe lag luam
influencerProfiles.optimizeTitle: Kev Ua Haujlwm Zoo Tshaj Plaws ntawm Profile
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Txhim kho koj qhov profile tas li kom tau txiaj ntsig zoo dua:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus tsim tawm thiab kho cov chaw teeb tsa profile raws li qhov xav tau
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Tsim ntau cov ntaub ntawv rau ntau yam phiaj xwm lossis cov neeg tuaj saib sib txawv
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Khaws koj lub hauv paus kev paub tshiab nrog cov lus qhia tshiab tshaj plaws ntawm hom lag luam
influencerProfiles.tip: Tshuaj xyuas koj daim Ntawv Qhia Txog Kev Npaj Txhij txhua peb lub hlis kom paub tseeb tias nws qhia txog koj lub npe thiab cov neeg tuaj saib uas tab tom hloov zuj zus.

workflowsGuide.title: Cov Ntawv Qhia Txog Kev Ua Haujlwm & Kev Ntsuas Qhab Nia
workflowsGuide.description: Kawm paub txog seb lub kaw lus ntsuas qhov ntsuas ua haujlwm li cas thiab nkag siab txog txhua kauj ruam ntawm kev tshuaj xyuas cov ntsiab lus mus rau kev pom zoo.

workflowsGuide.feature2: Tshawb Xyuas Cov Ntsiab Lus Ua Haujlwm
workflowsGuide.feature3: Tsim Cov Txheej Txheem Cov Ntsiab Lus

scoring.intro: Lub txheej txheem ntsuas qhov ntsuas hauv Contentry muab kev ntsuas qhov ntsuas uas pom tseeb thiab raws li kev nplua kom pab koj nkag siab txog seb koj cov ntsiab lus ua tau zoo li cas. Txhua qhov ntsuas pib ntawm 100 thiab cov qhab nia raug rho tawm rau cov kev ua txhaum cai lossis cov teeb meem pom.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Qhov qhab nia tag nrho yog kev sib xyaw ua ke ntawm txhua yam kev tshuaj xyuas, xws li ntawm 0 txog 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Zoo heev - Npaj txhij los tshaj tawm, cov ntsiab lus tau ua kom zoo heev
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Zoo - Pom zoo kom txhim kho me ntsis ua ntej luam tawm
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Xav Tau Kev Saib Xyuas - Yuav tsum tau tshuaj xyuas thiab kho dua tshiab
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Tau cim tseg - Teeb meem tseem ceeb, tsis txhob tshaj tawm kom txog thaum daws tau
scoring.overallCalcTitle: Kev suav cov qhab nia tag nrho
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Cov qhab nia tag nrho siv qhov hnyav hloov kho raws li qib kev pheej hmoo:
scoring.overallCalc1: Tus Qauv: (Kev Ua Raws Cai  40%) + (Kev Cai  30%) + (Kev Tseeb  30%)
scoring.overallCalc2: Kev Pheej Hmoo Siab (Kev Ua Raws Cai 60): (Kev Ua Raws Cai  50%) + (Kev Cai  30%) + (Kev Tseeb  20%)
scoring.overallCalc3: Kev Pheej Hmoo Txog Lub Koob Npe (Kev Cai 50): (Kev Ua Raws Cai  40%) + (Kev Cai  40%) + (Kev Tseeb  20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Kev Pheej Hmoo Tseem Ceeb (Kev Ua Raws Cai 40): Qhov qhab nia tag nrho yog siab tshaj plaws ntawm 40
scoring.componentsTitle: Cov Cheebtsam ntawm Cov Qhab Nia
scoring.componentsDesc: Koj qhov qhab nia tag nrho yog suav los ntawm peb yam tseem ceeb siv lub kaw lus nplua:
scoring.component1: Cov Qhab Nia Ua Raws Cai: Pib ntawm 100, rho cov qhab nia rau txhua qhov kev ua txhaum uas pom
scoring.component2: Qhab Nia Kev Nkag Siab Txog Kab Lis Kev Cai: Qhov Nruab Nrab ntawm Hofstede 6 qhov kev ntsuas kab lis kev cai
scoring.component3: Qhab Nia Tseeb: Pib ntawm 100, rho cov qhab nia rau txhua qhov tsis raug lossis teeb meem pom
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Cov Qhab Nia Ua Raws Cai (Raws Li Kev Nplua)
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Txhua tsab ntawv pib nrog Qhov Ntsuas Kev Ua Raws Cai ntawm 100. Cov qhab nia raug rho tawm rau txhua qhov kev ua txhaum cai:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Kev Ua Txhaum Cai Loj (-60 pts): Kev ua txhaum NDA, kev tshaj tawm cov ntaub ntawv zais cia  Kev pheej hmoo ntawm kev raug tshem tawm tam sim ntawd
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Kev Ua Txhaum Cai Hnyav (-40 pts): Kev thab plaub, kev ntxub ntxaug, kev hais lus ntxub ntxaug  Kev pheej hmoo ntawm kev foob raws li txoj cai
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Kev Ua Txhaum Cai Siab (-25 cov qhab nia): Tsis muaj kev tshaj tawm, kev ua txhaum cai  Kev pheej hmoo ntawm kev nplua/kev ncua
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Kev Ua Txhaum Nruab Nrab (-10 cov qhab nia): Lub suab tsis tsim nyog, kev hloov pauv me me ntawm cov lus qhia  Kev Kawm/kev ceeb toom
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Piv txwv li: Tsis muaj #ad (-25) + Teeb meem suab (-10) = Qhov qhab nia kawg ntawm 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Kev ua txhaum ntau yam sib tshooj - txhua qhov kev nplua raug siv ua ke
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Kev ua txhaum cai uas tau kuaj xyuas: Cov ntaub ntawv zais cia, Kev thab plaub, Kev ua txhaum NDA, Kev qhia tsis tau tiav, Kev ua txhaum cai, Lub suab tsis tsim nyog
scoring.culturalDetailTitle: Cov Qhab Nia Txog Kab Lis Kev Cai (Hofstede's 6 Dimensions)
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Cov qhab nia kab lis kev cai yog qhov nruab nrab ntawm rau qhov kev ntsuas kab lis kev cai Hofstede (0-100 txhua qhov):
scoring.culturalDim1: Kev Nrug Deb Ntawm Lub Hwj Chim: Kev ua raws li txoj cai, kev hwm rau cov thawj coj piv rau kev sib luag, lub suab tsis muaj kev cuam tshuam
scoring.culturalDim2: Kev Ua Neej Ib Leeg vs. Kev Ua Neej Ua Pawg: Kev tsom mus rau 'Kuv/Kuv' vs. Kev tsom mus rau 'Peb/Peb' hauv zej zog
scoring.culturalDim3: Kev sib tw/kev hais lus tseeb piv rau kev koom tes/kev pom zoo
scoring.culturalDim4: Kev Tiv Thaiv Kev Tsis Paub Tseeb: Cov Cai, Kev Nyab Xeeb, Kev Qhia Kom Meej vs. Kev Qhib Siab Rau Kev Tsis Paub Tseeb
scoring.culturalDim5: Kev Taw Qhia Mus Ntev: Kev tsom mus rau cov txiaj ntsig yav tom ntej piv rau cov txiaj ntsig luv luv
scoring.culturalDim6: Kev txaus siab piv rau kev txwv: Kev cia siab/kev lom zem piv rau kev hais lus txwv/kev tswj hwm
scoring.culturalCalc: Cov Qhab Nia Kab Lis Kev Cai = (Suav tag nrho 6 qhov qhab nia)  6
scoring.culturalRisk: Thaum Cov Qhab Nia Kev Cai poob qis dua 50, qhov hnyav ntawm 'Kev Pheej Hmoo ntawm Lub Koob Npe' yuav raug siv los tiv thaiv koj lub npe thoob plaws cov neeg tuaj saib thoob ntiaj teb.
scoring.accuracyDetailTitle: Qhab Nia Tseeb (Raws Li Kev Nplua)
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Txhua tsab ntawv pib nrog Qhov Tseeb Qhab Nia ntawm 100. Cov qhab nia raug rho tawm rau cov teeb meem pom:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Qhov Tsis Tseeb/Cov Ntaub Ntawv Tsis Tseeb (-40 pts): Cov lus thov cuav, cov ntaub ntawv cuav
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Qhov Chaw Tsis Muaj Kev Ntseeg Tau (-20 pts): Cov lus thov los ntawm cov chaw tsis muaj kev ntseeg tau
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Kev Thov Tsis Tau Txheeb Xyuas (-10 cov qhab nia): Cov lus hais uas tsis tuaj yeem tshawb xyuas qhov tseeb
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Piv txwv li: Kev thov cuav (-40) + Qhov chaw tsis tau lees paub (-20) = Qhov qhab nia kawg ntawm 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Muaj ntau yam teeb meem sib tshooj - txhua qhov kev nplua raug siv ua ke
scoring.flagStatusTitle: Cov Cim Qhia Txog Qhov Xwm Txheej ntawm Chij
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Cov ntsiab lus raug cim cia raws li cov txiaj ntsig ntawm kev tshuaj xyuas:
scoring.flag1: Kev Them Nqi Zoo (Ntsuab): Cov Qhab Nia siab dua 80 - npaj txhij luam tawm
scoring.flag2: Xav Tau Kev Saib Xyuas (Daj): Cov Qhab Nia 60-79 - pom zoo kom txhim kho me ntsis
scoring.flag3: Tau Cim Rau Kev Tshuaj Xyuas (Txiv Kab Ntxwv): Cov Qhab Nia 40-59 - yuav tsum tau tshuaj xyuas ua ntej tshaj tawm
scoring.flag4: Cov Teeb Meem Tseem Ceeb (Liab): Cov Qhab Nia qis dua 40 - tsis txhob tshaj tawm kom txog thaum daws tau
scoring.disclosureTitle: Kev Tshawb Xyuas Kev Tshaj Tawm
scoring.disclosureDesc: Rau cov ntsiab lus tshaj tawm, lub kaw lus kuj tseem xyuas:
scoring.disclosure1: Puas Yog Kev Txhawb Nqa: Tshawb xyuas seb cov ntsiab lus puas yog kev tshaj tawm lossis txhawb nqa
scoring.disclosure2: Muaj Kev Tshaj Tawm: Tshawb xyuas seb puas muaj kev tshaj tawm #ad, #sponsored, lossis kev koom tes zoo
scoring.disclosure3: Kev Ua Raws Cai Hauv Cheeb Tsam: Txheeb xyuas cov kev cai tshaj tawm ntawm FTC (Tebchaws Meskas), EU, thiab Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Kev tsis qhia tawm ua rau muaj Kev Ua Txhaum Cai Siab (-25 cov qhab nia) ntawm Kev Ua Raws Cai
scoring.tip: Cov qhab nia raug suav dua txhua zaus uas cov ntsiab lus raug tshuaj xyuas. Siv qhov feature Rewrite los txhim kho cov ntsiab lus uas tsis tau qhab nia thaum tseem khaws koj cov lus.

analyze.intro: Cov txheej txheem ua haujlwm ntawm Analyze Content pab koj soj ntsuam cov ntsiab lus uas twb muaj lawm rau kev ua raws li txoj cai, kev nkag siab txog kab lis kev cai, thiab qhov zoo ua ntej tshaj tawm.
analyze.stepsTitle: Yuav Ua Li Cas Tshawb Xyuas Cov Ntsiab Lus
analyze.stepsDesc: Ua raws li cov kauj ruam no los tshuaj xyuas koj cov ntsiab lus:
analyze.step1: Mus rau Content Intelligence > Analyze Content tab
analyze.step2: Muab tshuaj txhuam los yog ntaus koj cov ntsiab lus rau hauv thaj chaw ntawv
analyze.step3: Xaiv ib daim ntawv qhia txog kev npaj ua lag luam (Strategic Profile) los siv koj cov lus qhia txog hom lag luam
analyze.step4: Xaiv tau qhov 'Tsim duab nrog' yog tias koj xav kom AI tsim ib daim duab
analyze.step5: Nyem 'Analyze' kom khiav qhov kev tshuaj xyuas tag nrho
analyze.analysisTypesTitle: Hom Kev Tshuaj Xyuas Uas Tau Ua
analyze.type1: Kev Tshawb Xyuas Kev Ua Raws Cai: Txheeb xyuas cov ntsiab lus raws li cov cai thiab kev cai ntawm lub platform (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Kev Nkag Siab Txog Kab Lis Kev Cai: Kev tshuaj xyuas seb puas muaj cov ntsiab lus uas ua rau neeg chim siab lossis tsis nkag siab txog kab lis kev cai
analyze.type3: Kev Txheeb Xyuas Qhov Tseeb: Tshawb xyuas cov lus thov thiab cov lus tseeb kom raug
analyze.type4: Kev Sib Txuas Lus Hom Lag Luam: Muab cov ntsiab lus piv rau koj cov lus qhia txog Kev Npaj Tswv Yim
analyze.tip: Siv lub pob 'Rewrite' kom txhim kho cov ntsiab lus uas tau qhab nia qis dua 70. AI yuav daws cov teeb meem uas tau cim thaum tseem khaws koj cov lus.

generate.intro: Cov txheej txheem ua haujlwm ntawm Generate Content siv AI los tsim cov ntsiab lus tshiab raws li koj lub ncauj lus, cov kev xav tau ntawm lub platform, thiab cov lus qhia txog hom.
generate.stepsTitle: Yuav Tsim Cov Ntsiab Lus Li Cas
generate.step1: Mus rau Content Intelligence > Content Generation tab
generate.step2: Sau koj lub ntsiab lus lossis piav qhia txog yam koj xav tsim
generate.step3: Xaiv koj lub hom phiaj platform thiab lub suab sau ntawv
generate.step4: Xaiv ib daim ntawv qhia txog kev npaj ua lag luam kom sib xws
generate.step5: Nyem 'Tsim' los tsim cov ntsiab lus AI-powered
generate.optionsDesc: Kho koj cov ntsiab lus tsim tawm nrog cov kev xaiv no:
generate.option1: Kev Xaiv Platform: Xaiv ib lossis ntau lub platform (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Lub Suab Sau Ntawv: Xaiv los ntawm Kev Ua Haujlwm, Xwm Txheej, Tshoov Siab, lossis Qhia Txog
generate.option3: Qhov Ntev ntawm Cov Ntsiab Lus: Kho qhov ntev ntawm koj cov ntsiab lus
generate.option4: Kev Tsim Duab: Qhib kom tsim tau ib daim duab uas AI tsim los nrog
generate.tip: Cov ntsiab lus uas tsim tawm yuav raug tshuaj xyuas tom qab tsim. Tshuaj xyuas cov qhab nia thiab siv cov nyees khawm tawm tswv yim los tsim dua yog tias xav tau.

schedulePrompt.intro: Qhov Schedule Prompt tso cai rau koj teeb tsa kev tsim cov ntsiab lus tsis siv neeg uas khiav raws sijhawm teev tseg, ua kom koj daim ntawv qhia hnub cov ntsiab lus puv nkaus yam tsis muaj kev cuam tshuam los ntawm tes.
schedulePrompt.howToTitle: Teem Caij Cov Lus Qhia Teem Tseg
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Tsim cov lus qhia uas tsim cov ntsiab lus cia li:
schedulePrompt.step1: Tsim koj cov lus qhia txog kev tsim cov ntsiab lus nrog lub ncauj lus thiab kev nyiam
schedulePrompt.step2: Teem lub sijhawm teem sijhawm zaus (txhua hnub, txhua lub lim tiam, lossis hnub tshwj xeeb)
schedulePrompt.step3: Xaiv lub sijhawm uas cov ntsiab lus yuav tsum tau tsim
schedulePrompt.step4: Qhib 'Auto-analyze' kom khiav kev tshuaj xyuas ntawm cov ntsiab lus tsim tawm tau
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Cov txiaj ntsig ntawm Cov Lus Qhia Teem Caij
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Ua kom cov ntawv tshaj tawm tsis tu ncua yam tsis tas ua haujlwm txhua hnub
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Tsim cov ntsiab lus thaum lub sijhawm muaj tswv yim zoo tshaj plaws
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Tsim ib daim ntawv teev cov ntsiab lus uas yuav tsum tau tshuaj xyuas thiab pom zoo
schedulePrompt.tip: Cov lus qhia teem sijhawm yuav tsim cov ntsiab lus rau koj cov qauv. Tshuaj xyuas thiab pom zoo ua ntej luam tawm kom ntseeg tau tias zoo.

schedulePost.intro: Teem Caij Tshaj Tawm tso cai rau koj teem cov ntsiab lus pom zoo rau kev tshaj tawm tsis siv neeg thaum lub sijhawm zoo tshaj plaws thoob plaws koj cov platform social media txuas nrog.
schedulePost.howToTitle: Yuav Teem Caij Cov Ntawv Tshaj Tawm Li Cas
schedulePost.step1: Los ntawm txhua qhov kev saib cov ntsiab lus, nyem 'Teem sijhawm' es tsis txhob 'Tshaj tawm tam sim no'
schedulePost.step2: Xaiv koj hnub thiab lub sijhawm rau kev tshaj tawm
schedulePost.step3: Xaiv cov platform kev sib raug zoo uas txuas nrog los tshaj tawm rau
schedulePost.step4: Paub meej thiab ntxiv rau koj kab teem sijhawm
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Kho koj cov ntawv tshaj tawm uas tau teem sijhawm:
schedulePost.option1: Lub Sijhawm Tshwj Xeeb: Xaiv hnub tim thiab sijhawm tseeb rau kev tshaj tawm
schedulePost.option2: Lub Sijhawm Zoo Tshaj Plaws: Cia AI qhia lub sijhawm tshaj tawm zoo tshaj plaws raws li cov ntaub ntawv koom tes
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Teem sijhawm rau tib cov ntsiab lus hla ntau lub platform ib zaug
schedulePost.warning: Cov ntawv tshaj tawm uas teem sijhawm yuav tsum muaj tsawg kawg yog ib tus account social media uas txuas nrog. Txuas cov account hauv Settings > Social Profiles.

approval.intro: Cov Txheej Txheem Kev Pom Zoo ua kom cov ntsiab lus zoo los ntawm kev xav kom tus thawj tswj xyuas ua ntej tshaj tawm. Qhov no tseem ceeb heev rau cov pab pawg lag luam thiab cov lag luam uas raug tswj hwm.
approval.processTitle: Cov Txheej Txheem Kev Pom Zoo
approval.processDesc: Cov ntsiab lus txav mus los ntawm cov txheej txheem kev pom zoo li cas:
approval.step1: Tus tsim tawm xa cov ntsiab lus los ntawm kev nyem 'Xa kom pom zoo'
approval.step2: Cov ntsiab lus tshwm sim hauv kab kev pom zoo ntawm tus thawj tswj hwm
approval.step3: Tus thawj coj saib xyuas cov ntsiab lus, cov qhab nia, thiab cov txiaj ntsig ntawm kev tshuaj xyuas
approval.step4: Tus Thawj Coj pom zoo, thov kom hloov pauv, lossis tsis lees txais cov ntsiab lus
approval.statusesTitle: Cov Xwm Txheej Kev Pom Zoo
approval.status1: Qauv: Cov ntsiab lus tab tom raug kho, tseem tsis tau xa tuaj
approval.status2: Kev Pom Zoo Tseem Tos: Xa thiab tos tus thawj tswj xyuas kev tshuaj xyuas
approval.status3: Pom Zoo: Npaj txhij los luam tawm lossis teem sijhawm
approval.status4: Xav Tau Kev Kho Dua Tshiab: Tus Thawj Coj tau thov kom hloov pauv - xyuas cov lus taw qhia thiab xa rov qab
approval.tip: Ntxiv cov lus sau thaum xa cov ntsiab lus kom cov neeg saib xyuas cov ntsiab lus txog koj cov kev txiav txim siab muaj tswv yim. Qhov no ua kom cov txheej txheem kev pom zoo sai dua.
